website_summaries.verdict: True to the Three Stripes legacy, the Adidas CP Traxion Spikeless is designed to fulfill each man's golf needs. The unquestionable comfort and relentless traction serve as a great combination to satisfy both rookies and professions. Despite minor disappointments, golfers, generally, are all praises about this trainer.
pros: The Adidas CP Traxion Spikeless delivers comfort for golfers
It has quickly become the go-to shoe for many
According to plenty of users, the spikeless construction helps with hilly inclines, wet dew, downhill, and tough lies
The lugs are made up of a flexible material that doesn't cause damage to the greens nor causes pain on the bottom of the foot
According to several reviewers, the upper material gives exceptional water and weather protection
A couple of purchasers suggest that this shoe is a worthy addition to anyone's collection because of the signature Adidas styling
Given all the advantages gained on the course, many can attest that this is a big bang for the buck
The quality of the materials used on this shoe seems to be durable and at par with other Adidas footwear
The heel gently cradles the foot to stability, and the arches are not overly pronounced, states a few
cons: A small number of buyers say that the interior could use a little more padding
One says that he cannot stand the chemical smell of the shoe

customer_reviews.title: Good news and bad news
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my brother who recently retired and loves golf. He stated he wouldn't dare wear these on the greens because he thought they were too nice. He's going to wear as he goes throughout town.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Mom of the Bride.

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance...
customer_reviews.text: I almost always purchase Footjoy golf shoes. Started walking a lot more this year and was looking for a more athletic, lightweight, waterproof, spikeless golf shoe. Took a chance on this model Adidas golf shoe and really like them. They’re slightly less stable than a typical Footjoy, but I like this Adidas shoe. I’ve had Adidas golf shoes in the past, but the “soles” with the crevices quickly become dirty and I haven’t found a good way to clean them. This particularly pair are not designed with what I would call a popcorn soles. They are easily cleaned with water and a soft brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look good...feel great!
customer_reviews.text: Great show...wore it for 36 holes right out of the box and they were very comfortable. Good looking and feel great. What more can I say?!!?
customer_reviews.author: gkv

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: I did not find these to be supportive, well-constructed, or comfortable. Nor did I find them wide enough for wide sized shoes.
customer_reviews.author: EJTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on at my proshop in medium. they did not have wide. medium did not fit so i took a chance and ordered the wide at amazon. Played one round so far and they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: jiminfl

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an extra pair of golf shoes since I like to have two pair. They grip well and are stylish. I recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: UNC2018

customer_reviews.title: Not wide, even though they say wide
customer_reviews.text: They claim to be wide, even though the shoe doesn’t say it. The item description says wide. I have toe issues and it damn near put me in the hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Pete's Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: These ran a half size larger than expected. They are a very good looking and comfortable shoe that held good traction on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. It’s lightweight and everything you would expect from adidas according to my husband.
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I may be biased but Adidas does manufacture excellent products. The shoes is made of quality material and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: ReyR

customer_reviews.title: Wide does not mean wide!
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered these in a WIDE. The box said WIDE. The shoes did not say WIDE and were NOT WIDE. Thinking that perhaps the shoes had been wrongly boxed he reordered them. Exact same situation..The WIDE size is NOT WIDE!
customer_reviews.author: CJMoore

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful comfortable and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Definitely what I was looking for. However, they’re not really true to size in my opinion. I usually fit into a 8.5 comfortably but these seem to be a bit larger than expected but not so bad that I want to exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice golf shoe. Had a small heel problem( blister) but all is ok now. Nothing but positive comments on the look.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Ferrante

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Shoe for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable right out of the box. Good traction and definitely worth if for a 2nd/3rd pair of shoes. Great Price.
customer_reviews.author: Joel R Weiler

customer_reviews.title: Adidas black golf shoes for men
customer_reviews.text: I gave these shoes as a gift so they can play golf. They fit just right for a size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected from Adidas! I’ve worn them around the house, but haven’t had the chance to get to the golf course yet. They feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Jim A.

customer_reviews.title: Traxion Sl Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the shoe as it ran about 1/2 size too small. Quality made, good looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Mark_Latin

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn for one round but so far so good, I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Rjh

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price.... This is my first pair of spikeless golf shoes..and so far look and feel great.. packiging was perfect and arrived on time. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: GIUVIC

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box. Walked 18 holes and enjoyed my day.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable golf shoe. Put them on and walked 18 no problem
customer_reviews.author: David Brett

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for the price. Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Normally wear a 10 1/2, had to return for a 10 which fit perfectly. Comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: David Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good look fit weird
customer_reviews.text: Love the way they look. Don't quite fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Solid comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: They’re super comfortable shoes that didn’t require much break in time. The first time I wore them I walked 18 holes and my feet weren’t sore during or after the round. They also keep my feet dry without making them feel unbearably hot. I would definitely buy these shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect and are comfortable from the first wear.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Swickard

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if shoes are truly a wide size
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoe, good traction. I ordered an 11 wide. There was NOT a W inside the shoe on the tongue beside the 11 however there is a W on the box. The toes were a little cramped. Thought I would give them another round before returning
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great, waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered wide which fit great. Fully waterproof for early tee times.
customer_reviews.author: Stamford1234

customer_reviews.title: good every day use and nice style
customer_reviews.text: like it very much , use it every round since I got it thinking of ordering black color
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Mascardo

customer_reviews.title: Buy the correct "Adidas" size!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 11 1/2 Foot Joy but I knew from a previous Adidas purchase that I needed a 12 1/2 in Adidas to fit the same as a Foot Joy 11 1/2. The 12 1/2 fit as expected. Comfortable shoe for walking the course.
customer_reviews.author: James Barr

customer_reviews.title: They go on your feet
customer_reviews.text: Great value but didnt fit my dad he needed a wide.
customer_reviews.author: Chauncey big ups

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking shoe and super comfortable. Great price for such a nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: T. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Fit great knowing the size from previous Adidas I've opened.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R Makovec

customer_reviews.title: Size can be off.
customer_reviews.text: Asked for a 10 1/2 WIDE and received regular. I have caveman feet, I need that extra width.
customer_reviews.author: Randall  Grubbs

customer_reviews.title: Grips like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Good golf shoes for the avid golfer. Grips well in the wet dew, down hills, and through the swing on tough lies. Doesn’t tear my knee up like the spikes do.
customer_reviews.author: MStimp

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe medium to narrow foot
customer_reviews.text: Great fit well made shoe. Very comfortable and easy to maintain
customer_reviews.author: FL lifestyle

customer_reviews.title: Not a 14W....not even close.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my father and his feet were killing him after trying to play in them. He think they're 12s and definitely not wide shoes. They say 14 on them but it's not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Recipient

customer_reviews.title: Great buy with great comfort and traction.
customer_reviews.text: I got my Adidas cp Traxion shoes today and wore them for 18 holes and they were great. These are the first Adidas golf shoes for me and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: George R Snodgrass

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than I expected, somewhat tight.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is okay, but a little more length would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey J. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Sizing was wrong
customer_reviews.text: Quality seemed poor for this brand. They were sized wrong, so I Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Jcpat

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Played in the rain and the only dry spot on me were my feet. Great buy and its stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Too wide and short for size 11.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was too wide in the forward/toe area for me. They felt heavy and not especially pliable. A bit shorter than I find most size 11. Generally did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: tom fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My husband said they are the most comfortable pair of golf shoes he has ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Addidas Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and lite weight. Also, your feet won't get wet when playing in soggy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Deshun

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: They have plenty of grip and kept my feet nice and dry during a 27 hole round in the rain. They're light weight and comfortable aswell.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.text: Might be good to wear them a day before for a bit to stretch them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product from reliable seller. 🎅👍
customer_reviews.text: Thank you me for a great Christmas present. How did you know?
customer_reviews.author: david koch

customer_reviews.title: Wore out very quickly
customer_reviews.text: After a few wears, the heal tore out. They really hurt me when I play. I wouldn’t recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and comfortable golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of my Adidias golf shoes. The price was right. They are immediately comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kenton Ray Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are so comfy i wish the made a walk around version so light weight great shoe
customer_reviews.author: irving wamble

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable from first wear. Ran a little big, I usually wear 10.5, got these in a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie_G2

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shoe size in the box
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 10.5 Wide, received 10.5 even though the box said 10.5 W. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I feel soft on this shoes! Much better than my last one.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son is 13 and loves these shoes! Said they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Mika payne

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Cp Traxion Sl Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
feature_bullets: Lightweight microfiber leather upper with textile quarter
Lightweight Cloudfoam sockliner with durable spikeless Adiwear outsole and X-Traxion lug shapes and deep flex grooves
Flexible Bounce midsole cushioning; Low-profile Thintech brings you closer to the ground
Breathable, water-repellent Climastorm with a slightly wider forefoot
